name: Close-Encounter
description:
This is a 2d action shooting game

Space button for landing

W and Up Arrow Key for Jumping

A and Left Arrow key for going left

D and Right Arrow key for going right

Keep the cursor on the weapon and click on the E button for picking gun

Space button and Mouse Click for shooting

Hold T to return to Lobby

E for taking Parachute Items

R for reloading the gun

Please follow my itch account

Please follow my Scratch account

Link:https://scratch.mit.edu/users/ScratcherRounak/

Enjoy this game :
